OOC: Eh, what do i know, im not religious.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> OOC: Good point.  I think our spirits come from heaven tho.  :)
> ----- Original Message ----- 
> From: <Alloran2@a...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, January 22, 2001 8:01 PM
> Subject: Re: Disrespectful, Liono, disrespectful...(OOC, for Alten 
Gould)
> 
> 
> > OOC: I agree, Dcoburn. althoguh i must say that there is one 
> > difference between the Matrix and heaven. Bots not only go to the 
> > Matrix when they die, but their sparks also come from there.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> > > OOC: Alten Gould,
> > >         Yo dude, me and you may share the same dictionary, Hell 
is 
> > a place,
> > > but YOUR dictionary doesn't matter.  See, I'm against you 
saying 
> > Hell in
> > > this RPG too.  NOT because it's sometimes considered swearing, 
only 
> > because
> > > it is not proper transformer language.  Any Transformers/BW/BM 
fan 
> > knows
> > > that "Heaven" and "Hell" are not the proper terms for the 
> > transformers'
> > > heaven and hell
> > > 
> > > Our Version:  Heaven
> > > Transformer Version:  The Matrix
> > > 
> > > Our Version:  Hell
> > > Transformer Version:  The Pit
> > > 
> > >     So there ya go.  Sorry for any email boxes this clogs up 
and/or 
> > for
> > > anybody's time getting wasted.
> > 
> >
